statements: SELECT name, student_id, contact_details FROM student_information;
SELECT student_id, name, contact_details FROM student_information;
SELECT contact_details, name, student_id FROM student_information;
SELECT name FROM student_information WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM student_information WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT name, student_id, contact_details FROM student_information WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM student_information ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM student_information WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND contact_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT name, contact_details FROM student_information WHERE name LIKE '%son' ORDER BY contact_details DESC;
SELECT name, student_id FROM student_information WHERE student_id IN (456, 789, 1011) AND contact_details LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name, contact_details FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY student_id DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT students.student_id, students.name, courses.course_name FROM students INNER JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.student_id WHERE courses.course_name = 'Math' ORDER BY students.name ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, contact_details FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1,3,5) OR contact_details IS NOT NULL;

SELECT * FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.student_id WHERE students.name = 'Alice' OR courses.course_name = 'Science' ORDER BY students.student_id ASC, courses.course_id DESC;

SELECT students.student_id, students.name, courses.course_id, courses.course_name FROM students LEFT JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.student_id WHERE courses.course_id IS NULL ORDER BY students.student_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students_info;
SELECT student_name, contact_number FROM students_info WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students_info INNER JOIN enrollments ON students_info.student_id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students_info WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students_info WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students_info JOIN enrollments ON students_info.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(enrollment_id) AS total_enrollments FROM students_info JOIN enrollments ON students_info.student_id = enrollments.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students_info JOIN enrollments ON students_info.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE enrollment_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Students WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT course_name, credits, department FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, city, state, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id JOIN Addresses ON Students.student_id = Addresses.student_id;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, course_name, credits FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enroll_date FROM enrollments ORDER BY enroll_date DESC;
SELECT name, grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.id = g.student_id WHERE g.course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enroll_date FROM enrollments ORDER BY enroll_date DESC;
SELECT students.name, grades.grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.id = grades.student_id WHERE grades.grade >= 80;
